name: Runner’s Knee Tweak
desc: Step forward, keep back heel down, and drive front knee over middle toe. Mobilizes the ankle to save the knee.

name: The Cyclist’s Un-Hunch
desc: Hands on wall at hip height. Push head through arms. Flattens that rounded cycling spine.

name: Powerlifter Scapula Reset
desc: Interlace fingers behind back. Pull shoulders down and back while lifting chin. Reverses bench-press stiffness.

name: Swimmer's Internal Rotation
desc: Lie on side, arm at 90 degrees on floor. Gently push wrist toward floor. Essential for overhead health.

name: Golfer's Spine Spiral
desc: Lunge position. Rotate torso toward the front leg as far as possible. Hold for 3 deep breaths.

name: The 'Phone Neck' Fix
desc: Tuck your chin back (create a double chin). Hold 5s. Relieves the 45-lb pressure on your neck from scrolling.

name: Pitcher’s Windmill
desc: Large, slow arm circles. Focus on the very top of the reach where the shoulder usually hitches.

name: Tennis Elbow Glide
desc: Extend arm, palm away. Use other hand to gently pull fingers back while rotating the elbow crease up.

name: Soccer Player's Groin Opener
desc: Wide stance. Shift weight to one side and rotate the straight leg's toes to the sky.

name: Basketball Ankle Circle
desc: Draw the largest circle possible with your big toe. Slow and controlled to build ligament resilience.

name: Hiker's Calf Pump
desc: Stand on a step edge. Drop heels low and hold for 2s. Explosive raise. Repeat 10 times.

name: Grappler's Finger Splay
desc: Make a tight fist, then explode your fingers open as wide as possible. Repeat until forearms burn.

name: Crossfitter's Front Rack Reset
desc: Hold stick in front rack. Use a wall to push elbows up high. Increases wrist and lat flexibility.

name: Yoga Hip 'Stiffener' Fix
desc: Sit in 90/90. Rotate the back hip forward and squeeze the glute. Corrects 'too much' passive stretching.

name: Skateboarder's Pushing Leg Reset
desc: Deep lunge with back knee down. Reach arms to the sky to stretch the hip flexor of your 'pushing' leg.

name: Surfer’s Pop-up Prep
desc: Prone position. Push up into cobra, then immediately jump feet into a deep squat.

name: Boxer's Guard Stretch
desc: Forearm on door frame. Lean through to open the pec. Counteracts the 'hunched guard' posture.

name: Bowler’s Lunging Twist
desc: Long lunge. Reach opposite hand to front foot and reach other hand to the sky.

name: Rock Climber's Wrist Extension
desc: On all fours. Turn hands so fingers point toward knees. Lean back gently.

name: Deadlifter's Toe Touch
desc: Cross one leg over the other. Reach for toes. Hits the outer IT band and deep hamstrings.

name: The Desk-Job Hip Opener
desc: While sitting, cross ankle over knee. Lean forward with a flat back. Do this every hour.

name: Sprinter's Psoas Release
desc: High lunge. Tilt pelvis back (tuck tailbone). Reach arm of back leg up and over.

name: MMA Neck Isometrics
desc: Push the side of your head against a wall. Resist the movement. Build a neck that can handle impact.

name: Rower’s Lumbar Decompression
desc: Sit, spread knees, and fold your entire torso between your legs. Let your head hang heavy.

name: Hockey Player’s Adductor Slide
desc: On one knee. Slide other leg out to the side on a sock or towel. Feel the inner thigh stretch.

name: Volleyballer’s Shoulder Tap
desc: In plank position, tap opposite shoulder without moving your hips. Stability for overhead hits.

name: Dancer’s Arch Lift
desc: Stand. Lift your arches without curling your toes. Hold 10s. Foot 'core' strength.

name: Rugby Player’s Shoulder Roll
desc: Lie on stomach, one arm out at 90 degrees. Roll your body away from the arm.

name: Skiier’s Lateral Bind
desc: Cross legs while standing. Lean toward the side of the back leg. Stretches the lateral chain.

name: Gamer's Thumb Circles
desc: Rotate your thumb in wide circles. Then pull it gently away from the palm. Prevent carpal tunnel.

name: Triathlete’s Neck Pivot
desc: Lie on back. Rotate chin to shoulder. Reverses the 'aero position' neck cramp.

name: BJJ Guard Recovery Hip Circle
desc: On back, legs in air. Move knees in wide, opposing circles. Lubricates the hip sockets.

name: Gymnast’s Hollow Rock
desc: Back on floor. Arms and legs up. Rock like a rocking chair. Ultimate core-spine integration.

name: Wrestler’s Bridge (Gentle)
desc: Lie on back. Lift hips. Walk shoulders under. Only use head for balance if advanced.

name: Archer’s Lat Pull
desc: One hand on wall. Rotate body away. Breathe into the side of the ribcage.

name: Equestrian Inner Thigh Reset
desc: Butterfly stretch. Use elbows to gently pry knees toward the floor.

name: Cricketer's Side Bend
desc: Reach one hand down to the knee, other hand over head. Hits the obliques used in bowling.

name: Mountain Biker's Wrist Shake
desc: Vigorously shake wrists for 30s. Resets the nervous system after 'arm pump' vibration.

name: Lacrosse Player's Forearm Roll
desc: Use your stick to roll out the top of your forearm. Relieves grip fatigue.

name: Fencer’s Lunge Reach
desc: Extremely long lunge. Reach lead arm forward and trail arm back. Stretch the 'line'.

name: Quaterback’s T-Spine Twist
desc: On all fours. One hand behind head. Touch elbow to elbow, then rotate to sky.

name: Olympic Lifter's Ankle Rock
desc: Bottom of squat. Lean all your weight onto one knee to force ankle flexion.

name: Figure Skater’s Spiral Stretch
desc: Balance on one leg. Lift back leg. Rotate torso toward the standing leg.

name: Badminton Lunging Scoop
desc: Step into a deep diagonal lunge. Reach for the floor with a flat back.

name: Sailor’s Core Sway
desc: Stand wide. Shift weight side to side while keeping head level. Mimic moving deck.

name: Softball Pitcher’s Circle
desc: Full 360-degree arm rotation. Keep the palm facing away at the top.

name: Cheerleader’s Pike Stretch
desc: Sit, legs straight. Reach for toes. Pull your belly button toward your thighs.

name: Drummer's Ankle Tap
desc: While sitting, tap your toes as fast as possible for 60s. Prehab for the kick drum.

name: Chef’s Wrist Flexion
desc: Backs of hands together in front of chest. Drop elbows. Stretches the top of the wrist.

name: Writer’s Finger Extension
desc: Press palms together in prayer position. Peel them apart except for the fingertips.

name: Cyclist's Quad Smash
desc: Roll from hip to knee. Spend extra time just above the kneecap.

name: Runner's IT Band Release
desc: Ball on the side of the hip. Move your leg back and forth like a windshield wiper.

name: Lifter's Pec Minor Smash
desc: Ball against wall. Place it in the 'notch' below your collarbone. Lean in.

name: Golfer's Glute Smash
desc: Sit on the ball. Find the meat of the glute. Rotate the knee in and out.

name: Swimmer's Lat Roll
desc: Side-lying. Roller in armpit. Roll slowly toward the ribs.

name: Hiker's Arch Roll
desc: Stand on the ball. Roll from the heel to the base of the toes.

name: Climber's Forearm Roll
desc: Ball on a table. Press your forearm into it and move in small circles.

name: Tennis Player's Calf Smash
desc: Ball under calf while sitting. Move your foot in large circles.

name: Soccer Player's Hip Flexor Roll
desc: Lie face down. Ball just inside the hip bone. Breathe and sink.

name: Basketball Player's Shin Roll
desc: All fours. Roller under shins. Roll from ankle to below the knee.

name: Weightlifter's Tricep Smash
desc: Place tricep on a barbell. Move your arm from straight to bent.

name: Boxer's Upper Trap Smash
desc: Ball between your traps and a wall. Lean in and shrug your shoulder.

name: Rower's Lower Back Roll
desc: Roll the lower back gently. Keep core tight. Support with your hands.

name: Hockey Player's Adductor Smash
desc: Roller parallel to your body. Place inner thigh on it and roll.

name: Volleyballer's Rotator Cuff Smash
desc: Lie on side. Ball behind the shoulder blade. Move arm up and down.

name: Skier's Tibialis Smash
desc: Ball on the outside of the shin bone. Lean your weight into it.

name: Gamer's Neck Smash
desc: Ball at the base of the skull. Lie down and gently nod your head.

name: Surfer's Rib Smash
desc: Roll the side of your ribcage. Breathe deeply as you move.

name: Wrestler's Ear/Jaw Release
desc: Gently massage the jaw hinge with your fingers. Open and close your mouth.

name: Crossfitter's Glute Med Smash
desc: Ball on the high, outer side of the glute. Lean and breathe.

name: Runner's Tibial Posterior Stretch
desc: Sit on heels. Turn heels out slightly. Stretches the deep calf.

name: Cyclist's Hip Extension
desc: One foot on bench behind you. Drop into a lunge. Reach arms back.

name: Lifter's Scapular Pushup
desc: Plank position. Move only your shoulder blades together and apart.

name: Golfer's Lead Arm Stretch
desc: Pull lead arm across chest. Use other arm to pull it tight. Rotate torso.

name: Swimmer's Doorway Y-Stretch
desc: Hands high on frame in a Y. Lean through to stretch lats/chest.

name: Hiker's Downward Dog
desc: Hips high. Drive heels down. Focus on stretching the entire back chain.

name: Climber's Finger Curl Stretch
desc: Fingertips together. Push them against each other until fingers are flat.

name: Tennis Player's Internal Shoulder Rotation
desc: Back against wall. Arm at 90. Rotate hand down to touch wall.

name: Soccer Player's Quad/Hip Flow
desc: Lunge forward, then sit back into a hamstring stretch. Flow 5 times.

name: Basketball Player's Ankle Eversion
desc: Band around foot. Pull foot outward against resistance. Strengthens ankles.

name: Weightlifter's Wrist Extension
desc: Palms on wall, fingers down. Lean your weight into your hands.

name: Boxer's Neck Lateral Stretch
desc: Ear to shoulder. Use hand to gently add weight. Keep opposite shoulder down.

name: Rower's Hamstring Floss
desc: Lying on back. Hold thigh. Straighten and bend the knee 15 times.

name: Hockey Player's Glute Stretch
desc: Ankle over knee. Lean forward. The classic 'pigeon' for skaters.

name: Volleyballer's Thoracic Reach
desc: On all fours. Reach one arm under and through. Touch shoulder to floor.

name: Skier's Side Lunge Hold
desc: Hold a deep side lunge. Stay as low as possible for 30 seconds.

name: Gamer's Wrist Shake
desc: Shake hands as if trying to get water off them. 30 seconds.

name: Surfer's Cobra Stretch
desc: Lie on stomach. Push up. Look over one shoulder, then the other.

name: Wrestler's Hip Switch
desc: Sit on floor, knees bent. Drop both knees to one side, then the other.

name: Crossfitter's Wall Ball Stretch
desc: Hands high on wall. Lean chest in. Stretches shoulders for overhead work.

name: Runner's Big Toe Stretch
desc: Kneel with toes tucked. Make sure the big toe is vertical.

name: Cyclist's Chest Opener
desc: Lie on back. Arms in a T. Let gravity open your chest.

name: Lifter's Elbow Smash
desc: Ball on the bicep/elbow junction. Bend and straighten arm.

name: Golfer's Neck Rotation
desc: Look as far left as possible. Then as far right as possible. Slow.

name: Swimmer's Ankle Extension
desc: Sit on your heels. Lift your knees slightly to stretch the tops of feet.

name: Hiker's Hip Bridge
desc: Lie on back. Lift hips. Squeeze glutes. Resets the hips after a climb.

name: Climber's Reverse Finger Curl
desc: Touch thumb to each fingertip. Then flick them open wide.

name: Tennis Player's Forearm Glide
desc: Elbow straight. Hand down. Use other hand to push. Relieves 'tennis elbow'.

name: Soccer Player's Calf Pump
desc: Hands on wall. One foot back. Pump the heel up and down 20 times.

name: Basketball Player's Lateral Ankle Hold
desc: Stand on one leg. Try to keep your foot perfectly flat for 60s.
